alert.note: Alert for Spencer; Vanderburgh; Warrick (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:47AM EST until January 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky...Illinois...Indiana... Ohio River at Newburgh Dam...Mount Vernon...J.T. Myers Dam... Shawneetown...and Golconda For the Ohio River...including Newburgh Dam, Mount Vernon, J.T. Myers Dam, Shawneetown, and Golconda...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ohio River at Newburgh Dam. * WHEN...Until early Saturday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 39.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Sunday morning and continue falling to 19.6 feet Thursday, January 20. - Flood stage is 38.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 800 PM CST.
